properties.areaDesc: Waters from Pt. St. George to Cape Mendocino CA from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 14 at 2:53AM PST until January 16 at 3:00AM PST by NWS Eureka CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, south winds 30 to 40 kt with gusts
up to 50 kt and seas 14 to 18 feet at 10 seconds expected. For
the Small Craft Advisory, west winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up
to 30 kt and seas 12 to 14 feet at 13 seconds.

* WHERE...Pt St George to Cape Mendocino 10 to 60 nm.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 7 AM Wednesday to 3 AM PST
Thursday. For the Small Craft Advisory, until 7 AM PST
Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM PST WEDNESDAY... ...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM WEDNESDAY TO 3 AM PST THURSDAY
